byline.original: By ERIK ECKHOLM and TIMOTHY WILLIAMS
byline.contributor: Ashley Southall contributed reporting from Washington, Ian Lovett from Los Angeles and Steven Yaccino from Chicago.

snippet: Demonstrations similar to the one that began in Lower Manhattan last month are popping up across the country, aided by social media and fueled by anger at financial institutions.
lead_paragraph: Demonstrations similar to the one that began in Lower Manhattan last month are popping up across the country, aided by social media and fueled by anger at financial institutions.

headline.main: Anti-Wall Street Protests Spreading to Cities Large and Small
headline.print_headline: Anti-Wall Street Protests Spreading to Cities Large and Small
